ceo_ltip_max_pct_of_salary_source: “€540,000 annual base salary paid to each executive director.” and “The face value of the awards… was €6m for the CEO.”
post_cessation_holding_years_source: “Executive directors will be required to hold shares exceeding 100% of salary… for two years post-employment.”
shareholding_requirement_ceo_source: “Minimum share ownership requirements are set at three times executive director base salary.”

extraction_notes: Currency set to EUR based on € amounts throughout the remuneration tables. No bonus plan (STIP) was proposed or paid for 2024, so bonus % fields are null. No CEO salary increase percentage or workforce salary increase percentage disclosed. Dilution metrics (actual total/ltip/stip) are not disclosed; only the LTIP plan capacity of up to 5% of issued share capital was provided and captured as dilution_policy_limit_pct. CEO LTIP max % of salary computed as (€6,000,000 face value at full vesting) / (€540,000 base salary) × 100 = 1111.11%. Post-cessation holding requirement is two years; CEO shareholding requirement is 3x salary. ESG/Non-financial metrics are present in LTIP performance conditions.
